AAL.caption: Use element IDs for headers (when available)
AAL.doc: Use the inputted ID attribute for elements for the CSV column headers (default headers will be used where no ID is provided)
AAL.name: useElementIds

AAW.caption: Get CSV Text
AAW.doc: Expose the CSV text. For large CSVs, disabling this text should improve performance a little (if you only want to export the file).
AAW.name: get_csv_text

AAX.caption: Get CSV File
AAX.doc: Expose the CSV file. For large CSVs, disabling this file should improve performance a little (if you only want to export the text).
AAX.name: get_csv_file

AAZ.caption: File Type
AAZ.doc: Set the separator for the exported file
AAZ.name: file_type

AAd.caption: Quotes to use around escaped cells
AAd.doc: Choose a type of quotes to use to surround cells that contain characters which must be escaped. For example, if a cell contains a comma and the CSV uses commas to separate the cells, the text of this cell will be surrounded by quotes.
AAd.name: quote_char
